channel.title: Fixed
channel.description: I'll rep who ever helps me fix this as much as i can if you help me fix this damn error! Alright, this hasit happend to me befor, all i did was add the kingblackdragon to npcdrops.config with drops.(He was already added)i already undid everything i did and still get this error. I added 3 items with stats. And thats like all i did. I reversed it complied and still get this error so help?O_o [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww2/demonlover16/help.jpg[/img]

item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

WowILikeToCode:

You have used a space instead of a tab in your NPCdrops.CFG, You will need to remove the space and replace it with a Tab, or you will continue to get an error.

Im pretty sure that doesnt work, the npc i added drops to i removed it all.

Read full topic
